title: Did John Kennedy say: " There is a plan in this country to enslave every man, woman, and child? '
subtitle: The conspiratorists claim that President Kennedy issued a warning seven days before he was assassinated.
author: David Emery
vclaim: President John Kennedy said: "There is a conspiracy in this country to enslave every man, woman and child. Before I leave this noble and noble position, I intend to expose this conspiracy."
